articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Cricket grandstand collapses during first Sri Lanka-Australia test in Galle
articles.description: Heavy rain and wind causes the roof of a temporary grandstand to collapse before the start of play on day two of the first test in Galle.
articles.content:
The roof on a makeshift grandstand at Galle International Stadium has collapsed in heavy rain and wind before the start of play between Sri Lanka and Australia.
<ul><li>Sheets of corrugated iron ble… [+1067 chars]

articles.title: Cricket Australia expects packed stadiums for T20 World Cup
articles.description: Ticket demand for the Twenty20 World Cup in Australia later this year suggests there will be packed houses for the marquee event, the country's cricket board CEO Nick Hockley said.
articles.content:
Ticket demand for the Twenty20 World Cup in Australia later this year suggests there will be packed houses for the marquee event, the country's cricket board CEO Nick Hockley said on Wednesday.

articles.title: Shane Warne memorial - watch & follow updates
articles.description: Watch live coverage and follow text updates and tributes from the state memorial for Australian cricket legend Shane Warne at the Melbourne Cricket Ground.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
